word_group.brief_definition: 南部非洲；非洲南部；南非洲
南部；南部地区；南部的地方
南部边境；南界；南部边界
中国南方航空公司；中国南航
南方司令部；南方指挥部

bilingual.source: Grits are a staple food in the southern United States.
bilingual.target: 粗玉米粉是美国南部的主食。

bilingual.source: The Kalahari is a big area of bushland in the southern Africa.
bilingual.target: 卡拉哈里沙漠是非洲南部的一大片灌木丛。

bilingual.source: Eight hundred years ago, a man in southern Turkey invented an clock.
bilingual.target: 八百年前，土耳其南部的一个人发明了一个时钟。

bilingual.source: Eight hundred years ago, a man in southern Turkey invented an amazing clock.
bilingual.target: 八百年前，土耳其南部的一个人发明了一个惊人的时钟。

bilingual.source: In the seas of southern Brazil, for example, dolphins use an intelligent plan to get food.
bilingual.target: 例如，在巴西南部的海洋中，海豚利用聪明的计划来获取食物。

bilingual.source: Later we went to the "Waldsee", in the southern part of Freiburg.
bilingual.target: 后来我们去了弗赖堡南部的“沃尔多塞”。

bilingual.source: My mother bore me in the southern wild.
bilingual.target: 母亲背着我在南部的原野。

bilingual.source: The southern part broke into three pieces.
bilingual.target: 南部的板块分裂成三块。

bilingual.source: They are shot out of a volcano in southern Italy.
bilingual.target: 他们被急流冲出了位于意大利南部的一座火山。

bilingual.source: They are in charge of beach travel in southern China.
bilingual.target: 他们负责中国南部的沙滩旅行。

list.abstract: southern（英 [ˈsʌðən]，美 [ˈsʌðərn]），英语单词，作形容词为在南方的；向南方的；朝南方的。短语搭配有southern China（中国南方）。例句为“Flamenco is very popular in southern Spain.（弗拉门戈在西班牙南部很受欢迎。）” southern相关近义词有austral，相关反义词有northern。

yingyinNormal.en: It's two zones on the southern end. Then you have your bailout.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只要南端两个区，你就可以救市了。

yingyinNormal.en: Hong Kong is located on the southern coast of The People's Republic of China.
yingyinNormal.zh: 香港位于中华人民共和国的南岸。

yingyinNormal.en: Singapore is situated in South East Asia, just off the southern tip of Malaysia.
yingyinNormal.zh: 新加坡是个东南亚国家，地处马来西亚岛南端。

yingyinNormal.en: Prince Hans of the Southern Isles. Princess Anna of Arendelle. Princess? My Lady.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是南部小岛的汉斯王子。 我是安瑞戴尔的安娜公主。公主？尊敬的公主。

yingyinNormal.en: The region of Hong Kong is on the southern coast of China at the Pearl River estuary.
yingyinNormal.zh: 香港位于中国南部海岸的珠江口地区。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh yeah? What's his last name? Of the Southern Isles? What's his favorite food? Sandwiches.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是吗？那他姓什么？ 姓..南方群岛？他最喜欢吃什么? 三明治。

yingyinNormal.en: The South, I guess. Southern Jungle, the Seeonee. Beautiful, I hear. I never been there myself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我猜是南边吧。南部森林，小移山，听说那很美，不过我还没去过。

yingyinNormal.en: How can it be? What is it? Mother and Father's ship. But this isn't the Southern Sea. No, it isn't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么会这样？那是什么？父亲和母亲的船。可这里并不是南海。确实，这里不是。

yingyinNormal.en: You wish to gather Southern China into one indomitable force and gird them for the final unification.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你希望把南部中原聚集成一股坚不可摧的武装力量，利用他们为一统中原做准备。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry, are you unaware of the upcoming Southern California Robot Fighting League Round Robin Invitational?
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉，难道你不知道即将举行的南加州机器人格斗循环邀请赛？

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you. Oh, there she is. Elsa! I mean Queen... Me again. May I present, Prince Hans of the Southern Isles.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢，她在这里。埃尔莎! 我是说.. 皇后。我又来了，我向您介绍南部小岛的汉斯王子。

yingyinNormal.en: I bet he's busy. He's a weatherman in southern California. He has to be ready in case temperatures plunge below 70 degrees.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我猜他肯定很忙。他可是南加州的天气预报员啊。他得时刻准备着，万一温度猛降到“21度”以下立即报道。

yingyinNormal.en: That's right, Ben. I'm Santa's representative for all the southern states. And Mexico. But, Santa sent me here to give you these presents, Ben.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，班，我是圣诞老人的西南州代表，还有墨西哥，圣诞老人要我来这里送礼物给你。

yingyinNormal.en: These workers are employed in the largest urban area in the world, Guangdong Province in southern China where many of them live the entire year.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些工人在世界上最大的城镇地区工作，中国南方的广东省，他们中很多人平时就在那里生活。

yingyinNormal.en: Thousands of passengers' lives are on the line. All right, let's go out west to southern California tracon. Can you give us any more information?
yingyinNormal.zh: 几千乘客的生命都掌握在电话中。好的，从西转到南部，加利福尼亚管制中心。再给我们一点信息。

yingyinNormal.en: The Albert Memorial is at the southern end of Kensington Gardens, and the striking bronze statue looks towards the Royal Albert Hall just across the road.
yingyinNormal.zh: 阿尔伯特纪念馆位于肯辛顿花园的南端，那引人注目的铜像昂首地看着马路对面的皇家阿尔伯特音乐厅。

yingyinNormal.en: Then there was that dialect coach who helped you with that play where you needed a southern accent. Which after twenty hours of lessons still came out Jamaican.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我付钱请教练教你说南方腔，上了20小时的课后，你还是满口牙买加腔。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 在南方的；向南方的；朝南方的；生活在南方的；源于南方的；从南面吹来的；南方的；南方居民的；有南方特点的

word_family.mean: n. 南；南部；坐在南首位置的人；英格兰南部；美国南部各州；南方；南方不发达国家

examination_example.sentence: Dickens was born in Portsmouth, on England's <highlight>southern</highlight> coast.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 狄更斯出生于英格兰南部海岸的Portsmouth。

examination_example.sentence: There is no doubt of the alternative — the corrupted landscapes of <highlight>southern</highlight> Portugal, Spain or Ireland.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毫无疑问还有另一种选择——葡萄牙南部、西班牙或爱尔兰的腐败景观。

examination_example.sentence: Some archaeological sites have always been easily observable — for example, the Parthenon in Athens and the Stonehenge in <highlight>southern</highlight> England.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些考古遗址总是很容易被观察到，例如雅典的帕台农神庙和英格兰南部的巨石阵。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 我出生在邵阳，一个美丽的城市在中国南方。

examination_example.sentence: Most birds fly to <highlight>southern</highlight> Europe and Africa in summer.

examination_example.sentence: It is a traditional kind of music from the <highlight>southern</highlight> states of America.
